name: Honeybadger Webpack App
description: An example Rails 5.1/Webpacker application demonstrating honeybadger's webpack plugin to emit a source map to un-minify JavaScript

ASSETS_URL.description: 'assetsUrl' parameter for Honeybader Webpack Source Map plugin, change to match your environment by changing YOUR-HEROKU-SLUG-NAME

GIT_COMMIT.description: the current git commit SHA that corresponds to the 'revision' parameter in the honeybadger-js configuration
